name: passwordless-auth-react
title: Passwordless Auth for React and Supabase
description: Passwordless authentication for React using Supabase Auth. Supports both Magic Link and OTP (One-Time Password) login methods. Components only, no routing included.
docs: You'll need to set the following environment variables in your project: `VITE_SUPABASE_URL` and `VITE_SUPABASE_PUBLISHABLE_OR_ANON_KEY`.
